languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}Проктор-взыскатель{/g} Соломон Антар, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}. Назовите свое имя и цель пребывания на Райкаде Минорис". {n}Его голос звучит спокойно и ровно, но пальцы застыли на курке оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}Проктор-взыскатель{/g} Соломон Антар, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}. Назовите свое имя и цель пребывания на Райкаде Минорис". {n}Его голос звучит спокойно и ровно, но пальцы застыли на курке оружия.{/n}

languages.text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}Проктор-взыскатель{/g} Соломон Антар, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}. Назовите свое имя и цель пребывания на Райкаде Минорис". {n}Его голос звучит спокойно и ровно, но пальцы застыли на курке оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Antar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his fingers are frozen on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar of the Adeptus Arbites. State your name and purpose of stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}Although his voice sounds even and calm, his shotgun is pressed into his shoulder — a position that makes it easy to raise one's weapon and open fire.{/n}

"Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

"Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

"Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}Although his voice sounds even and calm, his shotgun is pressed into his shoulder — a position from which one might easily raise one's weapon and open fire.{/n}

"Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}Although his voice sounds even and calm, his shotgun is pressed into his shoulder — a position from which one might easily raise one's weapon and open fire.{/n}

"Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}Although his voice sounds even and calm, his shotgun is pressed into his shoulder — a position from which one might easily raise one's weapon and open fire.{/n}

"Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Antar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his fingers are frozen on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

languages.text: "Proktor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar vom {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Nennt Euren Namen und den Grund Eures Aufenthaltes auf Rykad Minoris." {n}Seine Stimme ist ruhig und fest, aber sein Finger ruht auf dem Abzug seiner Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Proktor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar vom {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Nennt Euren Namen und den Grund Eures Aufenthaltes auf Rykad Minoris." {n}Seine Stimme ist ruhig und fest, aber sein Finger ruht auf dem Abzug seiner Waffe.{/n}

"Proktor-Exaktant Solomorne Anthar von den Adeptus Arbites. Nennt Euren Namen und den Grund Eures Aufenthaltes auf Rykad Minoris." {n}Obwohl seine Stimme ruhig klingt, presst er den Kolben seiner Schrotflinte an seine Schulter ... was dich durchaus dazu verleiten könnte, das Feuer zu eröffnen.{/n}

languages.text: « Proctor-exactant Solomorne Anthar de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Déclinez votre identité et la raison de votre présence sur Rykad Minoris. » {n}Bien que sa voix semble calme et posée, son doigt reste en position sur la gâchette de son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Proctor-exactant Solomorne Anthar de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Déclinez votre identité et la raison de votre présence sur Rykad Minoris. » {n}Bien que sa voix semble calme et posée, son doigt reste en position sur la gâchette de son arme.{/n}

« Proctor-exactant Solomorne Anthar de l'Adeptus Arbites. Déclinez votre identité et la raison de votre présence sur Rykad Minoris. » {n}Bien que sa voix semble calme, son fusil à pompe est calé contre son épaule, une position dans laquelle il n'aurait aucun mal à lever son arme pour ouvrir le feu.{/n}

languages.text: «Procurador-Exactor Solomorne Anthar, del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Diga su nombre y el motivo de su presencia en Rykad Minoris» {n}Su voz es tranquila, pero no aparta el dedo del gatillo de su arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Procurador-Exactor Solomorne Anthar, del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Diga su nombre y el motivo de su presencia en Rykad Minoris» {n}Su voz es tranquila, pero no aparta el dedo del gatillo de su arma.{/n}

«Procurador-Exactor Solomorne Anthar, del Adeptus Arbites. Diga su nombre y el motivo de su presencia en Rykad Minoris». {n}Aunque el tono de su voz es sereno y neutral, la culata de su escopeta está firmemente apoyada contra su hombro, una postura desde la cual no le costaría nada levantar el arma y abrir fuego.{/n}

languages.text: “这里是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}，索罗蒙·安萨督审监察官。请说出你的名字，阐明你在小莱卡德逗留的目的。”{n}尽管他的声音非常平静，但他的手指却牢牢地扣在武器的扳机上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这里是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}，索罗蒙·安萨督审监察官。请说出你的名字，阐明你在小莱卡德逗留的目的。”{n}尽管他的声音非常平静，但他的手指却牢牢地扣在武器的扳机上。{/n}
“这里是帝国法务部，索罗蒙·安萨督审监察官。请说出你的名字，阐明你在小莱卡德逗留的目的。”{n}尽管他的声音听起来非常平静，没有一丝感情，但他手中的霰弹枪却紧紧压在肩膀上。这个姿势可以迅速举枪开火。{/n}

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局所属{/g}、エクザタント代理人ソロモーン・アンサールです。あなたの名前と、このライカド・ミノリスに滞在する理由を言ってください」{n}声こそ平静で落ち着いているものの、彼の肩にはショットガンが構えられていて、そこからいつでも銃を上げて発砲できる体勢だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}Although his voice sounds even and calm, his shotgun is pressed into his shoulder — a position from which one might easily raise one's weapon and open fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局所属、代理人ソロモーン・アンサールです。あなたの名前と、このライカド・ミノリスに滞在する理由を言ってください」{n}声こそ平静で落ち着いているものの、彼の肩にはショットガンが構えられていて、そこからいつでも銃を上げて発砲できる体勢だった。{/n}
「高等裁定局所属、エクザタント代理人ソロモーン・アンサールです。あなたの名前と、このライカド・ミノリスに滞在する理由を言ってください」{n}声こそ平静で落ち着いているものの、彼の肩にはショットガンが構えられていて、そこからいつでも銃を上げて発砲できる体勢だった。{/n}

languages.text: "Ben {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites'ten{/g} Zaptçı Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. İsminizi ve Rykad Minoris'te bulunma amacınızı derhâl beyan edin." {n}Sesi sakin çıksa da parmağını silahının tetiğinde sıkıca tutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}His voice is calm and even, yet his finger remains firmly positioned on the trigger of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites'ten{/g} Zaptçı Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. İsminizi ve Rykad Minoris'te bulunma amacınızı derhâl beyan edin." {n}Sesi sakin çıksa da parmağını silahının tetiğinde sıkıca tutuyor.{/n}

"Ben {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}'ten Zaptçı Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. İsminizi ve Rykad Minoris'te bulunma amacınızı derhâl beyan edin." {n}Duygusuz ve sakin bir sesle konuşuyor olmasına rağmen pompalısını omzuna dayalı tutuyor. Silahını anında kaldırıp ateş açmakta zorlanmayacağı belli.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar of the Adeptus Arbites. State your name and the purpose of your stay on Rykad Minoris." {n}Although his voice sounds even and calm, his shotgun is pressed into his shoulder — a position from which one might easily raise one's weapon and open fire.{/n}
